metadata.title: gstreamer1-plugins-good: integer underflow in extract_cc_from_data leading to OOB-read (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The CVE program describes this issue as: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handling components. An integer underflow has been detected in extract_cc_from_data function within qtdemux.c. In the FOURCC_c708 case, the subtraction atom_length - 8 may result in an underflow if atom_length is less than 8. When that subtraction underflows, *cclen ends up being a large number, and then cclen is passed to g_memdup2 leading to an out-of-bounds (OOB) read. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
gstreamer1-plugins-good is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
